Class XmlFeatures

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.modello.test.features.XmlFeatures
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class XmlFeatures extends Object implements Serializable
Test of XML specific parameters: see XmlMetadataPlugin class.
Version:
$Revision$ $Date$
